name: ICBFRB '20
description: International Conference on Behavioral Finance and Risk Behavior aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Behavioral Finance and Risk Behavior. It also provides a premier interdisciplinary platform for researchers, practitioners and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of Behavioral Finance and Risk Behavior.
